reviewText: Very informative...helped to raise significant dollars to support this worthwhile program
A great interview and an absolutely first rate product that will do wonders to aid infant survival in sub-Saharan Africa.

This segment from 60-minutes changed my life. Anderson Cooper's report on plumpy'nut, a revolutionary product that CURES starvation and malnutrition in 21 days! Malnutrition kills 5 million kids every year--one every 6 seconds. Through Doctors Without Borders, plumpy'nut is given to mothers in the poorest countries in Africa to help grow a generation. Check out Unicef's Web site, where you can donate plumpy'nut.
